verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump , a Republican presidential contender for 2016 ,] [V: had] [ARG1: McCain in his cross hairs again] [ARGM-TMP: following the senator 's critical comments this week] .
Trump , a Republican presidential contender for 2016 , had McCain in his cross hairs again [V: following] [ARG2: the senator 's critical comments this week] .
